SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Intro_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="b5fe66c90ce7472daa49940fa6cacb10" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Treasure hunter [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] at your service![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b5fe66c90ce7472daa49940fa6cacb10" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Thank you again for rescuing me.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="99a2b4ab02244db5b63e4db91edafccd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if they made a vehicle like you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it would be so much fun!
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="59d01ad83bea4cda9b9dfcb09577bedd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If I could create a machine to sniff out
treasures the way you do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it sure would
come in handy for treasure hunting.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="a87d411a5dc74b09af5cfa54328c4c1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]As soon as we found out about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s
Voyage Log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we started packing up our
things for a journey to this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a87d411a5dc74b09af5cfa54328c4c1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But I still don't know why our ship crashed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I keep it in tip-top shape...
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="860a7e308b174c8a85d063d6bcb9a9c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I was able to survive after the ship
crashed thanks to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="860a7e308b174c8a85d063d6bcb9a9c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]He used to be a ranger and is an expert
when it comes to survival skills!
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="2da4147f79624813b1078b5b70fdf088" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When the juice was stolen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we all chased
after the thief...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2da4147f79624813b1078b5b70fdf088" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]But I'm not the fastest runner.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I fell behind
and got separated from the other two.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="c43e4783777e4e2f9093edf972225a2c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is feeling cheery,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he's been
known to share stories about his time
as a ranger.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c43e4783777e4e2f9093edf972225a2c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]He had a partner he called Ducky.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Some
days they were best buds.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Other days...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] things weren't so ducky.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="3fd2d564914d45498c713e28a556b65a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'm embarrassed to admit it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but Koppai is
heading for a food crisis.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3fd2d564914d45498c713e28a556b65a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]We've kept things going by importing food
from nearby planets,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it'll be a disaster
soon if we don't figure something else out.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="a4a6e7974a3b4cf2a39f8b18237538a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I like customizing spaceships and
experimenting with different types
of engineering.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a4a6e7974a3b4cf2a39f8b18237538a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It's lucky that I spent some time making
adjustments to our ship's emergency-
escape system before this trip.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a4a6e7974a3b4cf2a39f8b18237538a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If I hadn't,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we might have all gotten
separated in the crash.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="5ef2f1ac3ef94c32821744bf512c89f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A long time ago,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] some high-profile guest
brought their pet to Koppai with them and
it got sick.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5ef2f1ac3ef94c32821744bf512c89f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It was [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] who took care of it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She
became a pretty famous vet all across
the universe after that.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="6a4e7e9300a14034a01c1e3577fcd5a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When we're searching for treasures,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I provide backup for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6a4e7e9300a14034a01c1e3577fcd5a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Kind of like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] does for you.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="8fbbb9e0465e4b0caa9c814d7e05403e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm actually the first of 15 siblings.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8fbbb9e0465e4b0caa9c814d7e05403e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Whenever I go home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm always amazed
to see how my little brothers and sisters
have grown.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="0a3e754f9a154dba8276669b19c5442d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I heard [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is also related to some
famous botanist.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0a3e754f9a154dba8276669b19c5442d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]I don't know much more than that though.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
She doesn't really like to talk about herself
that much.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="19bc3200d2d140008f47c7a5361b47c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Koppaites just eat what they like the best,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
then migrate somewhere else as soon as
an area runs out of their favorite food.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="19bc3200d2d140008f47c7a5361b47c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Maybe we need to change our ways.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We
could start appreciating more foods and
learn to produce them ourselves.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="74d8205a4a7143ad8b60fd45725393ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]We rely on the AI system for evaluating
treasures,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but its accuracy is pretty
hit or miss.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="74d8205a4a7143ad8b60fd45725393ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]That's why I'm researching those kinds
of software.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want to create a better
treasure-appraisal AI.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="decdbf4948be4504ae7058edfff92726" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]As soon as we found out about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s
Voyage Log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we started packing up our
things for a journey to this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="decdbf4948be4504ae7058edfff92726" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But I still don't know why our ship crashed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I keep it in tip-top shape...
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="4883dc035844442484e39d7726292a7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is feeling cheery,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he's been

as a ranger.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4883dc035844442484e39d7726292a7f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]He had a partner he called Ducky.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Some
days they were best buds.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Other days...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] things weren't so ducky.

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="60dad1d5618244108cd1ed4955a2201b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'm embarrassed to admit it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but Koppai is
heading for a food crisis.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="60dad1d5618244108cd1ed4955a2201b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSadNoVoice"/]We've kept things going by importing food
from nearby planets,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it'll be a disaster
soon if we don't figure something else out.
SV026.SV026_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="413265c27bb940cc957b1504c9dbb233" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I like customizing spaceships and
experimenting with different types
of engineering.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="413265c27bb940cc957b1504c9dbb233" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It's lucky that I spent some time making

escape system before this trip.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="413265c27bb940cc957b1504c9dbb233" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If I hadn't,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we might have all gotten
separated in the crash.

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="a54638e745e04a45bed305e0ddc7fe6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A long time ago,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] some high-profile guest

it got sick.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a54638e745e04a45bed305e0ddc7fe6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It was [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] who took care of it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She
